item.title: Step-by-Step How To Secure Your Home Wi-Fi Network From Hackers
item.description: Lock down your home router with practical steps that stop most hackers cold. I walk through changing defaults, picking strong encryption, and spotting weird activityâ€”stuff I do for my own setup in 2025.
